page.title: 07A large agricultural farm 1
page.content: I work on a large agricultural farm the main crops we have are sugar-beet, potatoes and corn. We have various grain crops like wheat and barley. The grain crop is drilled between autumn and winter. When it is ripe, we harvest the grain crop. We harvest it in late summer. We use a Combine Harvester to gather the grain. The grain is stored in large bins, until it is collected by lorries for milling or animal feed. We should drill sugar-beet seed in late March to April. One seed drill is used to plant as many as 12 rows at a time. We keep the crop weed free by either hand/machine hoe or spray. We harvest the sugar_beet at the end of September to the end of December. The sugar_beet is left in large heaps by the side of the road before collection by lorry.
